content:
From: Magnus Myreen <myreen@chalmers.se>
Hi all,

I'm looking to hire two new PhD students to work on interactive
theorem proving and functional programming, more precisely: on
CakeML-related topics (https://cakeml.org/) in HOL4
(https://hol-theorem-prover.org/). Kindly pass this on to
potential applicants.

  • Application deadline: 25 April 2017

  • Interviews start: 3-4 May 2017

  • Starting date: flexible but preferably no later than Sept 2017

The formal advert is here:

http://www.chalmers.se/en/about-chalmers/vacancies/?rmpage=job&rmjob=4954

Contact me if you have questions regarding these positions.

Kind regards,
Magnus
